channel.title: Approximate value of Sham Rocks?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Approximate value of Sham Rocks?"

item.title: Re: Approximate value of Sham Rocks?
Re: Approximate value of Sham Rocks?
item.content:encoded:
Permant Village Resident? What do you mean?

Also, would a 20k store permanent item be enough for 2 sham rocks?

item.title: Re: Approximate value of Sham Rocks?
item.content:encoded:
your best bet to get sham rocks IMO would be to run wasteland missions,

im not sure about the price of shamrocks tho, i would think it depends more on the person. right now in my village 2 shamrocks go for about 1 permant village resident.

item.title: Approximate value of Sham Rocks?
item.content:encoded:
I realize that I am going to face alot of special missions that require me to hang out with at least two allies at once and I think that having Floating on the Air would work well.

I asked my village if anyone would have one or two spare sham rocks but it seems that nobody does. I believe that only buying them from other players is the best option available but I have no ideas how much do they worth. If anyone knows the approximate value of 2 sham rocks, please let me know. Thanks.

(It would be great if someone has two sham rocks and willing to sell them to me, please let me know how much do you want or whether you are looking for any specific items)
